deck: Deck of Worlds - Eco Cards (Base Set)
description: Worldbuilding card system for creating detailed fictional worlds through microsettings with distinct geographic areas

region.name: Region
region.description: Main terrain types - hub for arranging other cards around

landmark.name: Landmark
landmark.description: Geographical sites and points of interest within regions

namesake.name: Namesake
namesake.description: In-world nicknames and prefixes to combine with Regions/Landmarks for atmospheric names

origin.name: Origin
origin.description: Significant past events - historical events that shaped the area

cues: LAST KNOWN LOCATION OF AN ANCIENT ARTIFACT
MENTIONED IN LORE BUT THE EXACT LOCATION REMAINS HIDDEN
BIRTHPLACE OF A FAMOUS POLITICAL LEADER
SITE OF A FAMOUS SCIENTIFIC DISCOVERY
FORMER SEAT OF A FALLEN EMPIRE
ORIGIN OF A POPULAR FOLK SONG
FORMER HOME OF A FAMOUS WRITER
ORIGIN OF A POPULAR STYLE OF MUSIC
ORIGIN OF A FAMOUS ART STYLE
SITE OF THE OLDEST RECORDED CULTURE
SHAPED BY A FAMOUS ART STYLE
FORMER SEAT OF A FALLEN EMPIRE
ORIGIN OF A POPULAR GAME OR SPORT
RECURRED IN A NOTORIOUSLY BAD DEAL
PROVIDED HAVEN DURING A HISTORIC DISASTER

attribute.name: Attribute
attribute.description: Present-day features - current characteristics of the area and its people

cues: STRICT SILENCE EXPECTED AT ALL TIMES
KNOWN FOR NEUTRALITY IN ALL CONFLICTS
KNOWN FOR A PLANT THAT ONLY BLOOMS ONCE ANNUALLY
EVERYONE HATES EVERYONE ELSE THE WEATHER
THERE IS A RUSH TO DISCOVER A MYTHICAL BURIAL SITE
THERE IS A RUSH TO DISCOVER VALUABLE IS REMAINING PECULIARITY
VILLAGE IS REMAINING PECULIARITY OF IMPROVISATION, DISCRETION, PROPORTION
THEY ARE UNDER SIEGE BY A FOREIGN POWER
A REVOLUTIONARY MANIFESTO IS CAUSING AN UPROAR
LOCALS ARE FALLING ILL WITH THE SAME STRANGE SYMPTOMS
THEY ARE DECLARING INDEPENDENCE FROM THEIR FORMER RULERS
THE SIGHTING OF A RARE CREATURE IS THRILLING HEADLINES
IS SAID TO BE GATHERING A SECRET SOCIETY
THE DOMINANT CULTURAL GROUP IS REWRITING HISTORY
FAMINE HAS STRUCK AND IS GETTING WORSE

advent.name: Advent
advent.description: Future-changing events - events that may alter the area's destiny

cards.cue: DISCOVERY OF A NEW RESOURCE
interpretations: A MINERAL, FUEL, OR PROSPECTING RUSH
IS CAUSING A PROSPECTING RUSH: LOCALS ARE PROTECTING, PROFITING, OR DIVIDED

cards.cue: UNKNOWN SOLDIERS ARE SETTING UP A STRONGHOLD
interpretations: REBEL GROUP, OR BANDIT TROOP
SUSPECTED TO BE A FOREIGN ARMY, SUSPECTED BANDIT TROOP

cards.cue: THE CLIMATE IS CHANGING RAPIDLY AND DESTRUCTIVELY
interpretations: HEALING ILL, COOLING DOWN, OF CHANGING WEATHER PATTERNS

cards.cue: THERE IS A RUSH TO DISCOVER
interpretations: A MYTHICAL BURIAL SITE: FOR REBELLIOUS REASONS, QUITE BORING, FOR BREAKING RIGHTS

cards.cue: VILLAGE IS REMAINING PECULIARITY
interpretations: OF IMPROVISATION, DISCRETION, PROPORTION, OR PROPAGANDA WAR

cards.cue: THEY ARE UNDER SIEGE BY A FOREIGN POWER
interpretations: AN ARMY, BOMBARDMENT, OR PROPAGANDA WAR

cards.cue: A REVOLUTIONARY MANIFESTO IS CAUSING AN UPROAR
interpretations: HIGHLIGHTING INJUSTICE, STOKING DIVISION, OR REVEALING POLITICAL SECRETS

cards.cue: AN INVASIVE SPECIES IS TAKING OVER THE ECOSYSTEM
interpretations: PLANT, PEST, OR PATHOGEN

cards.cue: A LAND DISPUTE IS UNDERWAY
interpretations: DISPIATE, ANCESTRAL, OR ACCIDENTAL

cards.cue: LOCALS ARE FALLING ILL WITH THE SAME STRANGE SYMPTOMS
interpretations: SLEEPING SICKNESS, ODD GROWTHS, OR ERRATIC MOODS

cards.cue: THEY ARE DECLARING INDEPENDENCE FROM THEIR FORMER RULERS
interpretations: A NATION, MONARCH, OR COMPANY

cards.cue: THE SIGHTING OF A RARE CREATURE IS THRILLING HEADLINES
interpretations: AN INVASIVE SPECIES IS TAKING OVER THE ECOSYSTEM: CREATURE IS THRILLING HEADLINES

cards.cue: IS SAID TO BE GATHERING
interpretations: A SECRET SOCIETY, MEETING AN ELECTION, GATHERING, CEREMONY

cards.cue: THE DOMINANT CULTURAL GROUP IS REWRITING HISTORY
interpretations: TO COVER UP A RECENT SCANDAL, PAST WRONG, OR ONGOING INJUSTICE

cards.cue: FAMINE HAS STRUCK AND IS GETTING WORSE
interpretations: DUE TO PRICE GOUGING, PANIC BUYING, OR FOOD RIOTS

cards.cue: A LEADER'S SUDDEN DEATH IS CREATING A POWER VACUUM
interpretations: TO BE FILLED BY HEIRS, COUNCIL MEMBERS, OR A VOTE

cards.cue: RECENT CONSTRUCTION HAS UNEARTHED A SECRET
interpretations: A ROOM, VAULT, OR TUNNEL

cards.cue: A LARGE SEASONAL MIGRATION IS ABOUT TO BEGIN
interpretations: HAS TAKEN AN UNEXPECTED TURN: RITUALS ARE SIMPERKING, DIVIDING THEIR ROUTE, OR COMING

cards.cue: AN OPPRESSED GROUP IS FIGHTING FOR THEIR RIGHTS
interpretations: POLITICAL REPRESENTATION, ECONOMIC OPPORTUNITY, OR CULTURAL EXPRESSION

cards.cue: A STRANGE GROUP CONFRONTATION IS GROWING
interpretations: SUPPOSEDLY CURSED BY WILDLIFE, POLICE OF SOMETHING SUPERNATURAL

cards.cue: A WORLD RECORD IS ABOUT TO BE BROKEN
interpretations: LARGEST HAUL, FASTEST TIME, LONGEST STREAK, TEMPERATURE, OR MULTIPLE FEET

cards.cue: A RARE CELESTIAL PHENOMENON IS APPROACHING
interpretations: IS HERALDED AS BE VISIBLE, OR ECLIPSE, METEOR SHOWER, OR CONJUNCTION SUNS

cards.cue: UNEMPLOYMENT IS AT AN ALL-TIME HIGH
interpretations: TRIGGERING SOCIAL UNREST, ECONOMIC RECESSION, OR EMIGRATION OF WORKERS

cards.cue: MYSTERIOUS SOUNDS ARE BEING HEARD AT NIGHT
interpretations: ARE BEING HEARD AT NIGHT: SINGING, SCREAMING, DIGGING, OR SINGING

usage.description: A 240-card worldbuilding system for creating detailed fictional worlds through microsettings

microsetting.definition: Core building block combining 1 Region (center), Landmarks (tucked under edges), 1 Namesake, 1 Origin (past), 1 Attribute (present), and 1 Advent (future)
microsetting.purpose: Each microsetting represents a distinct location with complete lore spanning past, present, and future

integration: Mix with Story Engine cards - Regions work as alternative Anchors, Namesakes as alternative Aspects
Create world maps by combining multiple microsettings
Use for campaign worldbuilding in RPGs
Generate settings for stories, games, or creative projects
